title: Fire Emblem Heroes: Fjorm ga Utau - "Kouri no Hana"

alternative_titles.en: Fire Emblem Heroes: Fjorm Sings - "Flower of Ice"
alternative_titles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム ヒーローズ フィヨルムが歌う「氷の華」

synopsis:
A music video featuring Fjorm: Princess of Ice singing Kouri no Hana by Hiroki Morishita, a composer from Intelligent Systems. The English version is sung by Cristina Vee Valenzuela, and the Japanese version by Rie Takahashi.

(Source: Fire Emblem Heroes Wiki)
